update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which NVMe metrics are collected.

binary_path.title: Binary path
binary_path.description: Path to the 'nvme' binary. The default path is 'nvme', and the executable is looked for in the directories specified in the PATH environment variable.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for executing the 'nvme' binary, specified in seconds.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
